items.title: Create and Assign Tasks
items.description: Allow users to create tasks and assign them to team members with due dates.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a task with title, description, and due date
User can assign a task to one or more team members
Task appears in assignee's task list
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: System should handle up to 1000 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment should complete within 2 seconds

items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable real-time updates to task status and details across all team members' devices.
acceptance_criteria: Changes to a task are reflected on all connected clients within 2 seconds
Users receive a notification when a task assigned to them is updated
Offline changes sync automatically when the device reconnects
non_functional: Updates should propagate with latency under 2 seconds
System should support real-time updates for up to 500 active tasks per team

notes: Assumed core features include task creation, assignment, notifications, and real-time updates as part of team collaboration. Further details on permissions, integrations, and UI design are not provided.
